channel.title: Korasi spec PI
channel.description: Hey guys, I'm trying to figure out how to make my korasi use two specs, I've just added it a few minutes ago. I need it to take 6.0 spec when used without ring of vigour. I've managed to make the ring work perfect, when I spec with it, it takes away the correct amount, but still trouble with making the korasi taking away 6.0 spec without the ring. If someone can help me out would be awesome. Thank you!

item.title: Korasi spec PI
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

That would of been my second guess.

Read full topic

item.title: Korasi spec PI
item.dc:creator: @I_like_pie_moo I like pie moo
item.description:
@I_like_pie_moo wrote:

[quote=“u loose, post:2, topic:525662”]I could be wrong.
But I think it has something to with itemassistant.java or something item.
In there look for the Id of korasi and change spec amount :)[/quote]

Thanks for trying though but I got it after digging around a bit.

In Combatassistant.java

case 13902: if(c.specAmount >= 5.5) { c.specAmount -= 5.5; c.getItems().addSpecialBar(weapon); return true; }

I simply had to change 5.0 to 5.5 I knew I had it at 5.5 but never made sure and when I did I was mistaking.

Read full topic

item.title: Korasi spec PI
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

I could be wrong.
But I think it has something to with itemassistant.java or something item.
In there look for the Id of korasi and change spec amount

Read full topic
